greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A quadrisection of A158122: a(n) = A158122(4n).
comment: See A060691 for the expansion of AGM(1,1-8x), where AGM denotes the arithmetic-geometric mean.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
formula: G.f.: A(x) = 2/B(x) where B(x) is the g.f. of A158213;
let F(x) = A(x^4) + 2*x/A(x^4) be the g.f. of A158122
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 14 2009
